Uses of Class
obs.ontologyAccess.bean.LightConceptBeanList

Packages that use LightConceptBeanList
obs.ontologyAccess Provides access tools to deal with different ontology repositories. 
obs.ontologyAccess.util   
 

Uses of LightConceptBeanList in obs.ontologyAccess
 

Methods in obs.ontologyAccess that return LightConceptBeanList
 LightConceptBeanList BioPortalAccessTool.getRootConceptBeans(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
          Returns the a list of concept beans of the ontology root concepts (i.e., concepts without parents).
 LightConceptBeanList BioPortalAccessTool.mapStringToLocalConceptBeans(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String localOntologyID, boolean exactMap)
          For a given String, returns the list of concepts in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false; Get the results by hitting the URL: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/software/?ontologyids={bioportal_virtual_ontology_id}&isexactmatch=[0|1] For instance: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/search/melanoma/?ontologyids=1009&isexactmatch=0 Attention, the results are in the latest version of the given ontology: the given localOntologyId is converted to virtual ontology id and then results are retrieved in that virtual ontology id (i.e., which corresponds to the latest localOntologyId in BioPortal which can be different from the given one).
 

Uses of LightConceptBeanList in obs.ontologyAccess.util
 

Methods in obs.ontologyAccess.util that return LightConceptBeanList
static LightConceptBeanList BioPortalAccessUtil.getRootConcepts(java.lang.String localOntologyID)
          Get list of concept beans from BioPortal for a given localOntologyID.
static LightConceptBeanList BioPortalAccessUtil.getSearchResults(java.lang.String s, java.lang.Integer ontologyID, boolean exactMap)
          Get list of concept beans from BioPortal for a given string to search and a virtual ontologyID to search in.
